Interface Character

All Known Implementing Classes:
MovingEnemy, Player
public interface Character
The interface for all other moving characters to be based on.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    float getXPosition()
    Gets the X position of the character
    float getYPosition()
    Gets the Y position of the character
    void move​(char dir)
    This will update the X and Y cooridinates interally to move the character
    void setXPosition​(float x)
    Sets the X coordinate of the player
    void setYPosition​(float y)
    Sets the Y coordinate of the player

  • Method Details

    • move

      void move​(char dir)
      This will update the X and Y cooridinates interally to move the character
      Parameters:
      dir - this direction will decide how x and y change

    • getXPosition

      float getXPosition()
      Gets the X position of the character
      Returns:
      the X position of the character

    • getYPosition

      float getYPosition()
      Gets the Y position of the character
      Returns:
      the Y position of the character

    • setXPosition

      void setXPosition​(float x)
      Sets the X coordinate of the player
      Parameters:
      x - set the X coordinate to x

    • setYPosition

      void setYPosition​(float y)
      Sets the Y coordinate of the player
      Parameters:
      y - set the Y coordinate to y
